author: Brad Colbow
description:
NEW COURSES: http://bradsartschool.com

This is basically a Samsung Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra but catered to artists. Beautiful OLED screen, a solid processor and the great Wacom Pro Pen 3. This is the android tablet I've been waiting for.
